trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class that manages events and layout for all the elements that a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> can contain.
trans-unit.target: Representa a classe base abstrata que gerencia eventos e o layout para todos os elementos que um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> pode conter.

trans-unit.source: A ToolStripItem is an element such as a button, combo box, text box, or label that can be contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> control, which is similar to a Windows shortcut menu.
trans-unit.target: Um ToolStripItem é um elemento, como um botão, caixa de combinação, caixa de texto ou rótulo que pode ser contido em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controle ou um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>controle, que é semelhante a um menu de atalho do Windows.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> class manages the painting and keyboard and mouse input, including drag-and-drop input, for these elements, and the ToolStripItem class manages events and layout within the elements themselves.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>classe gerencia a pintura e teclado e mouse de entrada, incluindo a opção de arrastar e soltar, de entrada, para esses elementos, e a classe ToolStripItem gerencia eventos e o layout de próprios elementos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: ToolStripItem classes either inherit directly from ToolStripItem, or they inherit indirectly from ToolStripItem through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.
trans-unit.target: Classes de ToolStripItem herdam diretamente de ToolStripItem ou herdam indiretamente de ToolStripItem por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>

trans-unit.source: ToolStripItem controls must be contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> and cannot be added directly to a form.
trans-unit.target: Controles de ToolStripItem devem estar contidos em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>e não podem ser adicionados diretamente a um formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The various container classes are designed to contain an appropriate subset of ToolStripItem controls.
trans-unit.target: Várias classes de contêiner são projetadas para conter um subconjunto apropriado de controles de ToolStripItem.

trans-unit.source: **Note** A given ToolStripItem cannot have more than one parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** ToolStripItem fornecido não pode ter mais de um pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: You must copy of the ToolStripItem and add it to other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: Você deve copiar o ToolStripItem e adicioná-lo para outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controles.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the elements that derive from the ToolStripItem class and which therefore can be hosted in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os elementos que derivam da classe de ToolStripItem e que portanto podem ser hospedado em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: |Element|Description| |-------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>|A toolbar button that supports images and text.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>|A text label typically used in a status bar or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> as a comment or title.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator>|A non-selectable space or space with a vertical bar that visually groups elements.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>|A ToolStripItem that hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>, other Windows Forms controls, or custom controls.
trans-unit.target: | Elemento | Descrição | |-------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>| Um botão de barra de ferramentas que oferece suporte a imagens e texto. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>| Um rótulo de texto geralmente usado em uma barra de status ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>como um título ou um comentário. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator>| Não selecionável espaço ou espaço com uma barra vertical que agrupa visualmente elementos. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>| Um ToolStripItem que hospeda um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>, outros controles de formulários do Windows ou controles personalizados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> is a text box in which the user can enter text, along with a list from which the user can select text to fill the text box.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>é uma caixa de texto no qual o usuário pode inserir texto, juntamente com uma lista da qual o usuário pode selecionar o texto para preencher a caixa de texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> enables the user to enter text.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>permite que o usuário insira texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> represents a Windows progress bar control contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>|A ToolStripItem that hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>representa um controle de barra de progresso do Windows contido em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>| Um ToolStripItem que hospeda um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> is a selectable option displayed on a menu or context menu.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>é uma opção selecionável exibida em um menu ou menu de contexto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> is a combination of a regular button and a drop-down button.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>é uma combinação de um botão regular e um botão suspenso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> is a button that supports drop-down functionality.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>|A panel in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control.|
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>é um botão que oferece suporte à funcionalidade da lista suspensa. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>| Um painel em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>controle. |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> class with the specified name, image, and event handler.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> classe com o manipulador de eventos, a imagem e nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que representa o nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> para exibir o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"></xref> event when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"> </xref> evento quando o usuário clica o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> class with the specified display text, image, event handler, and name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> classe com o texto de exibição especificado, a imagem, o manipulador de eventos e o nome.

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Image to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A imagem a ser exibida sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The event handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> assigned to the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> atribuído ao controle.

trans-unit.source: To get or set the AccessibilityObject property, you must add a reference to the Accessibility assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Para obter ou definir a propriedade AccessibilityObject, você deve adicionar uma referência para o assembly de acessibilidade instalado com o .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the "Active Accessibility" section in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre objetos acessíveis, consulte a seção "Acessibilidade ativa" na biblioteca MSDN em [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: For samples, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter exemplos, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> assigned to the control; if no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> is currently assigned to the control, a new instance is created when this property is first accessed
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> atribuído ao controle; se nenhum <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> atualmente atribuído ao controle, uma nova instância é criada quando essa propriedade é acessada pela primeira vez

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default action description of the control for use by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a descrição da ação padrão do controle para uso por acessibilidade aplicativos cliente.

trans-unit.source: An object's AccessibleDefaultActionDescription property describes the object's primary method of manipulation from the user's viewpoint.
trans-unit.target: AccessibleDefaultActionDescription propriedade de um objeto descreve o método de manipulação de ponto de vista do usuário principal do objeto.

trans-unit.source: This property should be a verb or a short verb phrase.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade deve ser um verbo ou uma frase curta verbo.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Not all objects have default actions, and some objects might have a default action that is related to its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, such as in the following examples: - A selected check box has a default action of "Uncheck" and a value of "Checked."
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Nem todos os objetos têm ações padrão, e alguns objetos podem ter uma ação padrão que está relacionada ao seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, como os exemplos a seguir:-caixa de seleção marcada tem uma ação padrão de "Desmarque" e um valor de "Checked."</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - A cleared check box has a default action of "Check" and a value of "Unchecked."
trans-unit.target: -Uma caixa de seleção desmarcada tem uma ação padrão de "Verificar" e um valor de "Desmarcado".

trans-unit.source: - A button labeled **Print** has a default action of "Press," with no value.
trans-unit.target: -Um botão rotulado **impressão** tem uma ação padrão de "Pressione", sem nenhum valor.

trans-unit.source: - A label or a text box control that shows **Printer** has no default action, but would have a value of "Printer."
trans-unit.target: -Um rótulo ou um controle de caixa de texto mostra **impressora** não tem nenhuma ação padrão, mas teria um valor de "Printer".

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see "Content of Descriptive Properties" in the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library, at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as propriedades de objetos acessíveis, consulte "Conteúdo descritivo propriedades de" na seção "Acessibilidade ativa" da biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: For samples, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter exemplos, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: The default action description of the control, for use by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: A descrição da ação padrão do controle, para uso por aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the description that will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a descrição que será relatada para aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: An object's AccessibleDescription property provides a textual description about an object's visual appearance.
trans-unit.target: AccessibleDescription propriedade de um objeto fornece uma descrição textual sobre a aparência visual do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The description is primarily used to provide greater context for low-vision or blind users, but can also be used for context searching or other applications.
trans-unit.target: A descrição é usada principalmente para fornecer contexto maior para usuários cegos ou de alguma deficiência visual, mas também pode ser usada para pesquisa de contexto ou outros aplicativos.

trans-unit.source: The AccessibleDescription property is needed if the description is not obvious, or if it is not redundant based on the object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleRole%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AccessibleDescription é necessária se a descrição não é óbvia, ou se não for redundante com base no objeto de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleRole%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleRole%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a button labeled **OK** would not need additional information, but a button that shows a picture of a cactus would.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um botão rotulado **Okey** seria não precisar de informações adicionais, mas seria um botão que mostra uma imagem de um cacto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleName%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleRole%2A> and, perhaps, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties for the cactus button would describe its purpose, but the AccessibleDescription property would convey information that is less tangible, such as "A button that shows a picture of a cactus."
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleName%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleRole%2A>e, talvez, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help%2A?displayProperty=fullName>as propriedades do botão cacto seriam descrevem sua finalidade, mas a propriedade AccessibleDescription seria transmitir informações que é menos tangíveis, como "Botão que mostra uma imagem de um cacto."</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Help%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleRole%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AccessibleName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see "Content of Descriptive Properties" in the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library, at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as propriedades de objetos acessíveis, consulte "Conteúdo descritivo propriedades de" na seção "Acessibilidade ativa" da biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: For samples, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter exemplos, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: The description of the control used by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do controle usado por aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the control for use by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do controle para uso pela acessibilidade aplicativos cliente.

trans-unit.source: The AccessibleName property is a label that briefly describes and identifies the object within its container, such as the text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>, the name of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or a label displayed next to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AccessibleName é um rótulo que descreve brevemente e identifica o objeto dentro do respectivo contêiner, como o texto em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>, o nome de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, ou um rótulo exibido próximo a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see "Content of Descriptive Properties" in the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library, at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as propriedades de objetos acessíveis, consulte "Conteúdo descritivo propriedades de" na seção "Acessibilidade ativa" da biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: For samples, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter exemplos, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: The name of the control, for use by accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: O nome do controle, para uso por aplicativos cliente de acessibilidade.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accessible role of the control, which specifies the type of user interface element of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a função acessível do controle, que especifica o tipo de elemento de interface do usuário do controle.

trans-unit.source: The AccessibleRole property describes what kind of user interface element an object is.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AccessibleRole descreve que tipo de elemento de interface do usuário é de um objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the control's role cannot be determined, the AccessibleRole property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se a função do controle não pode ser determinada, a propriedade AccessibleRole está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about properties of accessible objects, see "Content of Descriptive Properties" in the "Active Accessibility" section of the MSDN Library, at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as propriedades de objetos acessíveis, consulte "Conteúdo descritivo propriedades de" na seção "Acessibilidade ativa" da biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: For samples, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter exemplos, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item aligns towards the beginning or end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o item alinha até o início ou término do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: In a stack overflow layout, use the Alignment property along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to control the end to which items are aligned in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or to determine the end to which they are already aligned.
trans-unit.target: Em um layout de estouro de pilha, use a propriedade de alinhamento junto com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para controlar o final para o qual os itens são alinhados em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, ou para determinar a extremidade para o qual já estiverem alinhados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>, items marked as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment> are aligned to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and items marked <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment> are aligned to the right.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é de propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>, itens marcados como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment>são alinhados à esquerda do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e itens marcados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment>são alinhados à direita.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>, items marked as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment> are aligned to the right side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and items marked <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment> are aligned to the left.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é de propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>, os itens marcados como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment>são alinhados com o lado direito do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e itens marcados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment>são alinhados à esquerda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In flow and table layouts, the Alignment property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Em layouts de tabela e de fluxo, a propriedade de alinhamento é ignorada.

trans-unit.source: In flow or table layout, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> property to align the items within the row or table cell.
trans-unit.target: No layout de fluxo ou tabela, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A>propriedade para alinhar os itens dentro da célula da linha ou tabela.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether drag-and-drop and item reordering are handled through events that you implement.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o arrastar e soltar e reordenação de item são tratados por meio de eventos que você implementar.

trans-unit.source: Set the AllowDrop property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> property to `false` to respond to drag-and-drop behavior you have defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName> events.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade AllowDrop como `true` e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>propriedade `false` para responder ao comportamento de arrastar e soltar que você definiu no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the AllowDrop property to `false` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> property to `true` to cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> class to handle drag-and-drop and item reordering privately.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade AllowDrop como `false` e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>propriedade `true` para fazer com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>classe para lidar com arrastar e soltar e o item em particular a reordenação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting both the AllowDrop and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> properties to `true` throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Definir ambos o AllowDrop e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>propriedades `true` lança uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if drag-and-drop operations are allowed in the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se são permitidas operações de arrastar e soltar no controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the edges of the container to which a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is bound and determines how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as bordas do recipiente ao qual um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> está associado e determina como um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> é redimensionado com seu pai.

trans-unit.source: Use the Anchor property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de âncora para definir como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>é redimensionado automaticamente porque seu controle pai for redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Ancoragem de um controle para seu controle pai garante que as bordas ancoradas na mesma posição em relação as bordas do controle pai quando o controle pai é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Anchor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A âncora e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Somente um pode ser definido em um momento e o último conjunto tem precedência.

trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.target: O valor não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item is automatically sized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o item é dimensionado automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: Set the AutoSize property to `true` to cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> to adjust either its height or width, depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, to ensure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> uses only the required amount of space.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade AutoSize como `true` para fazer com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>para ajustar sua altura ou largura, dependendo da orientação do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, para garantir que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>usa somente a quantidade necessária de espaço.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> has a minimum size if the AutoSize property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>tem um tamanho mínimo se a propriedade AutoSize é `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: Set the AutoSize property to `false` if you want a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> to be smaller than the system-defined minimum size or to have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> size of zero.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade AutoSize como `false` se você quiser um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>para ser menor do que o tamanho mínimo definido pelo sistema ou ter um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>tamanho zero.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de plano de fundo para o item.

trans-unit.source: The BackColor property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade BackColor não dá suporte a cores transparentes, a menos que o `SupportsTransparentBackColor` valor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>é definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The BackColor property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade BackColor é uma propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade de ambiente é uma propriedade de controle que, se não for definido, será recuperado do controle pai.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> has the same BackColor as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>tem o mesmo BackColor como seu pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>por padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre propriedades de ambiente, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>classe ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the background color of the item.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> que representa a cor de plano de fundo do item.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a imagem de plano de fundo exibida no item.

trans-unit.source: Use the BackgroundImage property to place a graphic image onto an item.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade BackgroundImage para colocar uma imagem do gráfica em um item.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Images with translucent or transparent colors are not supported by Windows Forms controls as background images.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Não há suporte para imagens com cores transparente ou transparentes por controles de formulários do Windows como imagens de plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: > > This property is not supported on child controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: >> Essa propriedade não tem suporte em controles filho cujo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>é de propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>

trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e o local do item.

trans-unit.source: Use the Bounds property to determine the size and location of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de limites para determinar o tamanho e o local de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: Unlike other controls, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> has no property that enables you to set the upper-left corner of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de outros controles, um que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>não tem uma propriedade que permite que você defina o canto superior esquerdo de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>em relação ao canto superior esquerdo da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: If you need to set the absolute position of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, you must override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and define a custom implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.SetItemLocation%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisa definir a posição absoluta de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, você deve substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e definir uma implementação personalizada do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.SetItemLocation%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.SetItemLocation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> pode ser selecionado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The Click event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: O evento de clique passa um <xref:System.EventArgs>para seu manipulador de eventos, portanto apenas indica que ocorreu um clique.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseUp> events which pass a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar obter informações mais específicas mouse (botão, o número de cliques, rotação de roda ou local), use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseUp>eventos que passem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs>ao manipulador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: Um clique duplo é determinado pelas configurações de mouse do sistema operacional do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
trans-unit.target: O usuário pode definir o tempo entre cliques de um botão do mouse que deve ser considerada um clique duplo em vez de dois cliques.

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised every time a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: O evento de clique é gerado sempre que um controle é clicado duas vezes.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have two event handlers for the Click and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick> events of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the Click and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick> events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você tiver dois manipuladores de eventos para o clique e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>eventos de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, clique em e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>os eventos são gerados quando o formulário é clicado duas vezes e ambos os métodos são chamados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: If an item is double-clicked that does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick> event, the Click event might be raised twice.
trans-unit.target: Se um item é clicado duas vezes que não oferece suporte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>evento, clique em eventos poderão ser gerados duas vezes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.target: Isso é mais eficiente do que a definição do tamanho do construtor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.target: Isso normalmente é usado para alterar o estilo de exibição quando mostrando o mesmo item em um contexto diferente.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca o protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o que <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> bordas são encaixados para seu controle pai e determina como um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> é redimensionado com seu pai.

trans-unit.source: This property applies only to flow layouts.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade se aplica somente aos layouts de fluxo.

trans-unit.source: Use the Dock property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade Dock para definir como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>é redimensionado automaticamente porque seu controle pai for redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: For example, setting Dock to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, definindo o encaixe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>para alinhar-se com as bordas esquerdas do controle pai e são redimensionados à medida que o controle pai for redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth).
trans-unit.target: Controles são encaixados em sua ordem Z, que é a camada visual de controles em um formulário ao longo eixo z do formulário (profundidade).

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: Um controle pode ser ancorado a uma borda de seu contêiner pai, ou pode ser encaixado para todas as bordas e preencher o contêiner pai.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> and Dock properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A>e propriedades de encaixe são mutuamente exclusivas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Somente um pode ser definido em um momento e o último conjunto tem precedência.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Begins a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Começa uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: If the drag operation needs to interact with applications in another process, the `data` parameter must either be a base managed class (such as <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile?displayProperty=fullName>), an object that implements <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>, or an object that implements <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>.

trans-unit.target: Um clique duplo é determinado pelas configurações de mouse do sistema operacional do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user drags an item and the user releases the mouse button, indicating that the item should be dropped into this item.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário arrasta um item e o usuário libera o botão do mouse, indicando que o item deve ser descartado nesse item.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>estão em coordenadas da tela, não em coordenadas do cliente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user drags an item into the client area of this item.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário arrasta um item para a área cliente desse item.

trans-unit.source: The DragEnter event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the item during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O evento DragEnter é gerado quando o usuário arrasta primeiro o cursor do mouse sobre o item durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: Os comentários a seguir descrevem como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the item under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>método determina o item no local atual do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele verifica para ver se o item é um destino válido.

trans-unit.source: If the item is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o item for um destino válido, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: As alterações na posição do cursor do mouse, o estado de teclado e o estado do botão do mouse são rastreadas da seguinte maneira: - se o usuário sai de uma janela, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another item, the DragEnter for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra em outro item, DragEnter para o controle é gerado.

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo item, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma alteração no teclado ou mouse botão estado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade de evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>eventos são combinados para dar conforme o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário os comentários mais atualizados sobre a posição do mouse, da seguinte maneira: - se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem possa executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>Propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>estão em coordenadas da tela, não em coordenadas do cliente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user drags an item and the mouse pointer is no longer over the client area of this item.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário arrasta um item e o ponteiro do mouse não está mais na área cliente deste item.

trans-unit.source: The DragLeave event is raised when the user drags the cursor out of the control or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O evento DragLeave é gerado quando o usuário arrasta o cursor fora do controle ou o usuário cancela a operação de arrastar e soltar atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parent control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o pai de controle do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parent control of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle pai do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> estiver habilitada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled*> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled*>o valor da propriedade foi alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação programática ou a interação do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not raise the EnabledChanged event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>não dispara o evento EnabledChanged.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raise this event with specific property settings.
trans-unit.target: Gere este evento com as configurações de propriedade específico.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte do texto exibido pelo item.

trans-unit.source: Use the Font property to get or set the font that will be used by default for painting and text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de fonte para obter ou definir a fonte que será usada por padrão para pintura e texto em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> to apply to the text displayed by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> para aplicar o texto exibido pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O padrão é o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de primeiro plano do item.

trans-unit.target: O primeiro plano <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do item.

trans-unit.target: O padrão é o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor*>alterações de valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor%2A>propriedade é alterada por uma modificação de programação ou por meio da interação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not raise the ForeColorChanged event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>não dispara o evento ForeColorChanged.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raise this event with specific property settings.
trans-unit.target: Gere este evento com as configurações de propriedade específico.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> that is the container of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> que é o contêiner do atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: GetCurrentParent is a read-only accessor to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: GetCurrentParent é um acessador de somente leitura para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: A parent differs from an owner in that a parent denotes the returned current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in which the item is displayed, which might be in the overflow area.
trans-unit.target: Um pai difere de um proprietário de um pai denota atual retornado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>no qual o item é exibido, que pode ser na área de excedentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> that is the container of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> que é o contêiner do atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fit.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o tamanho de uma área retangular na qual um controle pode ser ajustado.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: A área tamanho personalizado para um controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> ordered pair, representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> ordenados par, que representa a largura e altura de um retângulo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>é gerado quando uma operação de arrastar e soltar é iniciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>evento permite que a origem de um evento arrastar para modificar a aparência do ponteiro do mouse para fornecer os comentários visuais do usuário durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: Os comentários a seguir descrevem como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the item under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>método determina o item no local atual do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele verifica para ver se o item é um destino válido.

trans-unit.source: If the item is a valid drop target, the GiveFeedback event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o item for um destino válido, o evento GiveFeedback é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: As alterações na posição do cursor do mouse, o estado de teclado e o estado do botão do mouse são rastreadas da seguinte maneira: - se o usuário sai de uma janela, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra em outro item, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>para que o controle é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo item, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma alteração no teclado ou mouse botão estado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>evento é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, para remover os dados, ou cancelar a operação com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade de evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the GiveFeedback event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>é gerado para continuar a operação e o evento GiveFeedback é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> and GiveFeedback events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>e GiveFeedback eventos são combinados para dar conforme o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário os comentários mais atualizados sobre a posição do mouse, da seguinte maneira: - se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem possa executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
