trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura, em pixels, de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the height, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>que representa a altura, em pixels.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a imagem que é exibida em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Image, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: A imagem, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>propriedades pertencem aos vários aspectos da manipulação de imagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Usar imagens em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controles, como definir essas propriedades diretamente ou definindo a execução de tempo – somente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: Escala da imagem é determinado pela interação de propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, da seguinte maneira:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>é a escala da imagem final conforme determinado pela combinação da imagem de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>configuração e o contêiner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>configuração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: -Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>é `true` (o padrão) e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem escala ocorre e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>é de tamanho do maior item ou um determinado tamanho mínimo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: -Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>é `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem nem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>escala ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> a ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Usar imagens em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controles, como definir essas propriedades diretamente ou definindo a execução de tempo – somente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: Escala da imagem é determinado pela interação de propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, da seguinte maneira:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>é a escala da imagem final conforme determinado pela combinação da imagem de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>configuração e o contêiner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>configuração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: -Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>é `true` (o padrão) e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem escala ocorre e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>é de tamanho do maior item ou um determinado tamanho mínimo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: -Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>é `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem nem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>escala ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, ImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: -Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>é `true` (o padrão) e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem escala ocorre e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>é de tamanho do maior item ou um determinado tamanho mínimo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: -Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>é `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem nem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>escala ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.target: O valor especificado é menor que -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color to treat as transparent in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> image.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor a ser tratada como transparente em um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> imagem.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the entire surface of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> and causes it to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Invalida a superfície inteira do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> e faz com que ele seja redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified region of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> by adding it to the update region of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>, which is the area that will be repainted at the next paint operation, and causes a paint message to be sent to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Invalida a região especificada do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> adicionando-o à região de atualização da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>, que é a área será pintada novamente na próxima operação de pintura e faz com que uma mensagem de pintura sejam enviados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the region to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a região para invalidar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o objeto foi descartado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has been disposed of; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle foi descartado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the item recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um caractere é um caractere de entrada que reconhece o item.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado durante o pré-processamento para determinar se o caractere de entrada fornecido deve ser pré-processados ou enviado diretamente para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> de mensagem de janela

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A> method returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>método retorna `true`, o caractere especificado é enviado diretamente a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the method returns `false`, the character is preprocessed and only sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o método retornar `false`, o caractere é pré-processados e só é enviado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>se ele não é consumido pela fase de pré-processamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.
trans-unit.target: O pré-processamento de um caractere inclui verificar se o caractere é um mnemônico de outro controle.

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character should be sent directly to the item and not preprocessed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caractere deve ser enviado diretamente para o item e não pré-processados; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular ou uma chave especial que requer pré-processamento.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A> method during window-message preprocessing to determine whether the specified key is a regular input key that should be sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> or a special key (such as PAGE UP, PAGE DOWN, ENTER, ESC, TAB, or arrow keys) that should be preprocessed.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>método durante o pré-processamento de mensagem da janela para determinar se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada normal que deve ser enviada diretamente para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>ou uma chave especial (como PAGE UP, PAGE DOWN, ENTER, ESC, TAB ou teclas de seta) que deve ser pré-processados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, the key is sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> only if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: No último caso, a chave é enviada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>somente se ele não é consumido pela fase de pré-processamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada normal; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the container of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> is a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o contêiner do atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the container of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> is a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o contêiner do atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> é um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement*>está definida como <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement*>

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o local de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> é atualizada.

trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>é atualizada por uma modificação de programação ou por meio da interação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not raise the LocationChanged event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>não dispara o evento LocationChanged.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.VisibleChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: The OnVisibleChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnVisibleChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the item is attached to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"></xref> or can float between the two.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se o item está associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton"> </xref> ou podem flutuar entre os dois.

trans-unit.source: Use the Overflow property in stack layouts.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de estouro em layouts de pilha.

trans-unit.source: In flow and table layouts, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and therefore the Overflow property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Em layouts de tabela e de fluxo, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>botão de estouro não é renderizada e, portanto, a propriedade de estouro será ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the owner of this item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o proprietário deste item.

trans-unit.source: Owner returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> whose Items collection contains the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: Proprietário retorna o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>cuja coleção de itens contém <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> atual</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: This is the best way to reference <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> or other properties in the top-level <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> without writing special code to handle overflow.
trans-unit.target: Essa é a melhor maneira de fazer referência a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>ou outras propriedades no nível superior <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>sem escrever código especial para manipular o estouro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Owner remains the same even if the item falls into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: O proprietário permanece a mesma, mesmo quando o item se enquadra em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>

trans-unit.source: The Owner can be `null` for certain elements that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> collection but not in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O proprietário pode ser `null` para determinados elementos que estão no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A>coleção, mas não no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> that owns or is to own the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> que possui ou deve possuir o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o OwnerItem de um **abrir** <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> normalmente seria uma **arquivo**<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.target: The parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> que representa o espaçamento interno do item, em pixels.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o item é redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parent container of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o contêiner pai do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GetCurrentParent%2A> is a read-only accessor to the Parent property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GetCurrentParent%2A>é um acessador de somente leitura para a propriedade pai.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GetCurrentParent%2A>

trans-unit.source: A parent differs from an owner in that a parent denotes the returned current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in which the item is displayed, which might be in the overflow area.
trans-unit.target: Um pai difere de um proprietário de um pai denota atual retornado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>no qual o item é exibido, que pode ser na área de excedentes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> raises paint events and so on, while the owner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> contains shared data such as image lists.
trans-unit.target: O pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>gera eventos de pintura e assim por diante, enquanto o proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>contém dados compartilhados, como listas de imagens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Parent property is set by the layout manager on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, a propriedade pai é definida pelo Gerenciador de layout em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> that is the parent container of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> que é o contêiner pai do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Click" name="Click" href=""></xref> event for a <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolStripItem" name="ToolStripItem" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gera um <xref uid="langword_csharp_Click" name="Click" href=""> </xref> evento para um <xref uid="langword_csharp_ToolStripItem" name="ToolStripItem" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current layout of the item.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o layout atual do item.

trans-unit.source: Inspect the Placement property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: Inspecione a propriedade de posicionamento em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>evento para determinar se um item foi colocado na principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, o estouro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, ou se ele não estiver sendo exibido em todos os.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: As razões comuns por que um item não é exibido são que o item não se ajustou no principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>propriedade foi definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the state of the item is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o estado do item é pressionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the state of the item is pressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o estado do item é pressionado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado durante o pré-processamento de mensagem para manipular as teclas de comando.

trans-unit.source: Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys.
trans-unit.target: As chaves de comando são chaves que sempre têm precedência sobre as chaves de entrada regulares.

trans-unit.source: Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: Aceleradores e atalhos do menu são exemplos de teclas de comando.

trans-unit.source: The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key.
trans-unit.target: O método deve retornar `true` para indicar que ele processou a chave de comando, ou `false` para indicar que a chave não é uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: The base-class implementation of ProcessCmdKey method returns `false` in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a implementação de classe base do método ProcessCmdKey `false` em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passada por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the ENTER and SPACEBAR keys in order to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado durante o pré-processamento de mensagem para manipular as teclas ENTER e barra de espaços para gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the item is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado somente se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>método indica que o item não está processando a chave.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave foi processada pelo item; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caractere mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give an item the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado para dar a oportunidade de processar um caractere mnemônico de um item.

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the item is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: O método deve determinar se o item está em estado de mnemônicos de processo e se se o caractere especificado representa um mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se assim, o método deve executar a ação associada ao mnemônico e retorno `true`.

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se não, o método deve retornar `false`.

trans-unit.source: This base-class implementation relies on the host <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the item's text.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação de classe base se baseia no host <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controle para chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>método para determinar se o caractere especificado corresponde a um mnemônico no texto do item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o método gera o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>evento e retorna `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an accessibility client application invokes help for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um aplicativo cliente de acessibilidade chama a Ajuda para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to allow users to invoke help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>classe para permitir que os usuários a chamar a Ajuda em seu objeto acessível, pressionando a tecla F1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> provides you with complete information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>fornece informações completas no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar e permite que a fonte determinar se a operação de arrastar e soltar deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: The QueryContinueDrag event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: O evento QueryContinueDrag é gerado quando há uma alteração no estado de botão do teclado ou mouse durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: The QueryContinueDrag event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: O evento QueryContinueDrag permite que a fonte determinar se a operação de arrastar e soltar deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: Os comentários a seguir descrevem como e quando os eventos relacionados às operações de arrastar e soltar são gerados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the item under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>método determina o item no local atual do cursor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele verifica para ver se o item é um destino válido.

trans-unit.source: If the item is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: Se o item for um destino válido, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>é gerado com o efeito de arrastar e soltar especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de arrastar e soltar, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner: - If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: As alterações na posição do cursor do mouse, o estado de teclado e o estado do botão do mouse são rastreadas da seguinte maneira: - se o usuário sai de uma janela, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse enters another item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse entra em outro item, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>para que o controle é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: - If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o mouse se move, mas permanece dentro do mesmo item, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the QueryContinueDrag event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma alteração no estado de botão do teclado ou mouse, o evento QueryContinueDrag é gerado e determina se deseja continuar a operação de arrastar, soltar os dados, ou para cancelar a operação com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade de evento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Continue`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>é gerado para continuar a operação e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>é gerado com o efeito de novo para comentários visuais apropriado podem ser definido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista dos efeitos de soltar válidas, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>enumeração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>eventos são combinados para dar conforme o mouse se move entre o local de destino, o usuário os comentários mais atualizados sobre a posição do mouse, da seguinte maneira: - se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Drop`, o valor de efeito de soltar é retornado para a fonte, para que o aplicativo de origem possa executar a operação apropriada nos dados de origem; por exemplo, recortar os dados se a operação foi uma movimentação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>

trans-unit.source: - If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: -Se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>é `Cancel`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a posição do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> texto e imagem em relação a cada um dos outros.

trans-unit.source: Use the TextImageRelation property to define or determine the relative placement of the image with respect to the text on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade TextImageRelation para definir ou determinar a posição relativa da imagem em relação ao texto em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: Items that lack an image, text, or both are treated as special cases so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> does not display a blank spot for the missing element or elements.
trans-unit.target: Os itens que não têm uma imagem, texto ou ambos são tratados como casos especiais para que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>não exibirá um espaço vazio para o elemento ausente ou elementos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that appears as a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref> for a control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto que aparece como um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref> para um controle.

trans-unit.source: ToolTipText works only if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: ToolTipText só funcionará se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A>for definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoToolTip%2A> is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property for the item is used as the ToolTipText.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoToolTip%2A>for definido como `true`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>propriedade para o item é usada como ToolTipText.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o texto de dica de ferramenta.
